ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 18. Northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
